subject: Cycling, Road
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador won his second Vuelta a España on Sunday, capturing a fifth victory in cycling’s major races just over a month after his doping ban ended.
snippet: Alberto Contador won his second Vuelta a España on Sunday, capturing a fifth victory in cycling’s major races just over a month after his doping ban ended.
